translations: 无动于衷地，冷漠地：以一种没有情感或表现出情感的方式。
· He spoke emotionlessly about the tragic event.
他毫无感情地谈论着那个悲惨的事件。

sentences.sentence: Just as emotionlessly as he had received "The Shame of the Sun" did he read the reviews of it that came in weekly from the clipping bureau.
sentences.translation: 他接到《太阳的耻辱》时无动于衷，读到剪报社每周给他寄来的评论时也照样无动于衷。
